coverage.note: Full coverage of confidence.ts functions and edge cases

tests.name: Low inputs should produce low confidence
tests.description: Verifies confidence < 0.4 with appropriate reasons for low signal coverage

tests.name: High inputs should produce high confidence
tests.description: Verifies confidence > 0.75 with positive reasons for strong inputs

tests.name: Edge cases should be clamped to [0,1]
tests.description: Ensures negative and >1 inputs are properly clamped

tests.name: Should always return exactly 3 reasons
tests.description: Verifies reason generation always returns exactly 3 explanatory strings

tests.name: Should use default model confidence when not provided
tests.description: Tests default model confidence of 0.85 for rule-only path

mathematicalProperties.deterministic: Same inputs always produce same outputs
mathematicalProperties.geometricMean: Uses weighted geometric mean for balanced scoring

reasonTypes: strong signal coverage across all dimensions
thin community reports for this company+role
moderate evidence quality from available sources
rich evidence from diverse recent sources
company values present; strong JD alignment
insufficient context and evidence for reliable assessment
